_comments.currency_symbol: The currency symbol to be displayed for product prices (e.g., '$', '€', '£').
_comments.display: Controls the visibility of different sections on the product card.
_comments.show_rating_on_card: Set to true to show the star rating, or false to hide it.
_comments.show_review_count_on_card: Set to true to show the total number of reviews next to the stars, or false to hide it.
_comments.show_description_on_card: Set to true to display the product's short description on the card.
_comments.show_reviews_on_card: Set to true to display the customer reviews section directly on the card.
_comments.badge: Controls the appearance of badges on the product card.
_comments.discount_variant: Style for the discount percentage badge. Options: 'default', 'secondary', 'destructive', 'outline'.
_comments.promo_type_classes: Tailwind CSS classes for the promo type badge (e.g., 'BOGO'). This allows for custom styling.

badge.promo_type_classes: relative z-10 text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider text-accent-foreground bg-accent px-2 py-1 rounded-sm
